CreateCollectionArea.what-do-you-want-to-do: What do you want to do?
CreateCollectionArea.language-of-the-query-and-search-results: Language of the query and search results
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-keyword:
Use this to find specific words.
Supports operators like AND / OR / NOT.
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-vector:
Use this to search for broader topics or information
that can be described in many different ways.

Note: this might return almost all documents, but sorted
so that the most relevant ones are at the top.
Only supports quoted phrases, not the AND / OR / NOT operators.
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-hybrid:
Combines keyword and meaning search.

Note: this might return almost all documents, but sorted
so that the most relevant ones are at the top.
Only supports quoted phrases, not the AND / OR / NOT operators.
CreateCollectionArea.add-filters-and-change-search-options: Add filters and change search options
CreateCollectionArea.vector-search-not-available-for-this-dat: Meaning / hybrid search is not yet available for this dataset.
CreateCollectionArea.query-operators-not-supported-for-vector:
The operators AND / OR are not supported for 'meaning' and 'hybrid' searches.
Please use filters and quoted phrases here or switch to 'keyword' search.
CreateCollectionArea.use-double-quotes-instead-of-single-quot: Note: use double quotes instead of single quotes to search for phrases.
CreateCollectionArea.auto-set-filters: Auto-detect language, required filters and search strategy
CreateCollectionArea.preview-feature: This feature is in preview and might not work as expected.
CreateCollectionArea.category_search_subtitle: Find individual items or curate a set of them
CreateCollectionArea.category_answer_subtitle: Find facts, list & count entities, generate overviews
CreateCollectionArea.category_process_subtitle: Process multiple items using AI, automate workflows
CreateCollectionArea.category_store_and_share_subtitle: Write down your knowledge and share item collections

LoginButton.you-need-to-accept-the-tos: You need to accept the terms of services and privacy policy to register.
LoginButton.warning-about-limited-features:
Only a limited set of features is available without logging in.
We recommend creating an account above, its free and just one step.
LoginButton.please-accept-the-tos: Please accept the terms of service and privacy policy

AddFilterMenu.note-not-all-filters-might-be-available-: Note: not all filters might be available in 'meaning' or 'hybrid' mode.
AddFilterMenu.descriptive-text-is-a-shortcut-for-these: * 'Descriptive Text' is a shortcut for these fields:

SearchModeBar.go-to-the-previous-search-result: Go to the previous search result
SearchModeBar.edit-the-search-query-and-filters: Edit the search query and filters
SearchModeBar.exit-search-tooltip: Remove search results and show saved items

SearchTaskExecutionSettings.run-on-new-items: Watch new {0} and add matching ones automatically
SearchTaskExecutionSettings.query-relaxation-should-be-turned-off: Query Relaxation' should usually be turned off for periodic tasks
SearchTaskExecutionSettings.only-available-for-keyword-searches: Periodic searches are currently only available for keyword searches.

WritingTaskArea.hint-only-ask-about-existing-items: Ask questions that can be answered using the items in this collection.

FilterBar.collection-item-filter-tooltip: This only affects already existing items / results.\nTo apply a filter to the normal search, use the filters there.

WordCloud.important-keywords-in-filtered-selected-: Important keywords in filtered / selected items:

item-view.search-result-tooltip: Only search results are shown. &nbsp Exit search to remove results and show saved items.
item-view.approve-all-tooltip: Approve all (relevant) search results and leave search mode

CollectionItem.found-by-meaning-tooltip: This item was mainly found because it matches the meaning of the search query.
CollectionItem.found-by-keywords-tooltip: This item was mainly found because it contains keywords of the search query.
CollectionItem.found-by-both-tooltip: This item was found by meaning and keywords.
CollectionItem.temporary-item-explanation: This item is temporary. Save it, otherwise it will be removed from the collection.
CollectionItem.mark-this-item-as-irrelevant: Mark this item as irrelevant, hide from future searches in this collection

AddColumnDialog.language-tooltip: Language of the question and results ('world' for auto-detect)
AddColumnDialog.default-sources-tooltip: Uncheck if anything beside the items text fields is relevant
AddColumnDialog.default-prompt-tooltip: Uncheck to use a custom prompt
AddColumnDialog.auto-run-approved-tooltip: Execute this as soon as an item is approved
AddColumnDialog.auto-run-candidates-tooltip: Execute this automatically for candidates (e.g. search results)
AddColumnDialog.using-full-text-hint-1:
Using the full text of an item might be slow and expensive.
The full text will also be limited to the maximum text length of the AI module, which might lead to unpredictable results.
AddColumnDialog.using-full-text-hint-2: Consider using 'Full Text Excerpts' instead, which selects only the most relevant parts of the full text.

app_state_store.column-module-llm-tooltip: Uses AI to answer a question based on each item separately
app_state_store.column-module-relevance-tooltip: Uses AI to check if an item is relevant given a set of criteria

WritingTask.model-select-tooltip: Select the AI model to use for this writing task
WritingTask.revert-changes-alert: Are you sure you want to revert to the last version? This cannot be undone.

SearchTaskDialog.auto-relax-query: Look for individual words if no results are found with all words
